title: Schema for BSI Grundschutz Stage 1.2 - Scope of Certification
description: Defines the structure for the scope description and an associated finding.

text.description: The formal text describing the scope of the audit (Geltungsbereich).

finding.description: A structured finding regarding the quality and completeness of the scope definition.

category.description: The category of the finding: 'AG', 'AS', 'E', or 'OK'.

description.description: A detailed description of the finding related to the scope definition.
